purpose.statement: This charter establishes the constitutional framework for human override authority over FjordHQ's epistemic systems, ensuring humans retain absolute veto power over the system's perception of reality.
purpose.legal_basis: Human oversight is a non-negotiable requirement for autonomous AI systems operating in regulated domains. This charter provides the audit trail and accountability framework required for legal defensibility.
purpose.governance_principle: The system serves human intent; humans do not serve the system.

tier_1_absolute.scope: Absolute and unconditional veto over all system outputs, ontologies, and canonical truths
tier_1_absolute.constraints: None - CEO authority is supreme within FjordHQ

tier_2_delegated.scope: Delegated authority over epistemic systems when CEO is unavailable
constraints: Must be explicitly designated by CEO in writing
Cannot modify constitutional documents (ADR-001 through ADR-020)

tier_3_emergency.scope: Emergency halt authority when human authority is unreachable
constraints: Must attempt human contact for 15 minutes before emergency halt
All emergency halts require post-incident human review within 24 hours

ikea_override.name: IKEA Classification Override
ikea_override.description: Force EXTERNAL_REQUIRED classification on any ontology path, regardless of system's automated classification
use_cases: CEO suspects stale data in critical domain
Breaking news not yet reflected in system
ikea_override.scope: Any node, edge, or ontology concept in fhq_canonical or fhq_graph
ikea_override.duration: Until explicitly lifted or TTL expiry

ontology_blocking.name: Causal Path Blocking
ontology_blocking.description: Freeze or block specific causal paths in Alpha Graph (IoS-007) deemed noisy or unreliable
ontology_blocking.scope: Any edge in fhq_graph.edges or node in fhq_graph.nodes
ontology_blocking.effect: Blocked paths excluded from FINN reasoning chains

seed_authority.name: Golden Seed Authorization
seed_authority.description: Sole authority to approve new 'Golden Seed' nodes in the truth base
seed_authority.definition: Golden Seeds are foundational truth nodes that other evidence builds upon
seed_authority.approval_requirement: Human signature required for ANY Golden Seed creation
seed_authority.delegation: CANNOT be delegated to CEIO or any agent

g0_override.name: G0 Gate Override
g0_override.description: Force a G0 proposal through despite failing automated checks
use_cases: Automated check known to be miscalibrated
constraints: Must document reason and risk assessment

system_halt.name: Emergency System Halt
system_halt.description: Immediately halt all FINN cognitive operations
system_halt.effect: DEFCON RED triggered, all cognitive operations suspended

logging_table.name: fhq_governance.how_override_log
logging_table.immutability: Records CANNOT be modified or deleted

audit_trail_requirements.audit_principle: Every override creates an immutable record. There is no 'off the record' override.
audit_trail_requirements.tampering_detection: Hash chain linking ensures any modification is detectable

clarification.vega_role: VEGA enforces governance rules and provides attestations
clarification.human_supremacy: Human authority supersedes VEGA in all cases
clarification.vega_response_to_override: VEGA logs the override and continues operation
vega_cannot: Resume operations after human halt without human authorization
vega_must: Log all human overrides without modification
Alert if override creates governance inconsistency
Request human review of long-standing overrides (>30 days)

detection_mechanisms.name: Override Frequency Monitoring
detection_mechanisms.action: Alert to CEO (if CEIO is acting) or Board (if CEO is acting)

detection_mechanisms.name: Pattern Analysis
detection_mechanisms.description: VEGA monitors for override patterns that suggest systematic bypass

detection_mechanisms.name: Justification Quality Review
detection_mechanisms.description: Monthly sampling of override justifications for adequacy

accountability.principle: With great power comes great accountability
accountability.override_responsibility: The human who issues an override assumes personal responsibility for the outcome
accountability.documentation_requirement: Inadequately documented overrides are flagged for immediate review

constraints: Only one active delegation per delegate at a time
HOW-003 (Golden Seed Authority) CANNOT be delegated

constitutional_protections.human_authority_clause: This charter may not be modified to reduce human authority without explicit CEO approval documented in a new ADR.
constitutional_protections.agent_subordination: No agent (LARS, FINN, STIG, LINE, VEGA) may claim authority equal to or greater than human override authority.
constitutional_protections.audit_inviolability: The override audit log is constitutionally protected and may not be purged, modified, or made inaccessible.

attestation.note: This charter protects both the human (accountability framework) and the system (clear authority boundaries).
